data.name: AppDescription
data.value: A place for you to record and track your product consumption. You can add, edit and delete products, as well as view consumption history.

data.name: AboutDescription
data.value: This page was created to solve a personal problem, but can be used by anyone if it makes sense. Its purpose is to allow simple management of purchased items, such as time and value.

data.name: PrivacyNotice
data.value: Additionally, all entered data is not sent to any server and there is no external synchronization. The information remains locally on your device, ensuring total privacy and security.

data.name: UseAsApp
data.value: Use this page as an app

data.name: PwaDescription
data.value: You can "install" this page as a PWA (Progressive Web App) and access it directly from your device's home screen or app menu.

data.name: InstallationInfo
data.value: This is not a traditional installation, like downloading a program, but rather a way to make access faster and more convenient. Also, once "installed", you can use it offline, without needing an internet connection to access already loaded content.

data.name: InstallInstructions
data.value: To add to your home screen, look for the "Add to home screen" or "Install app" option in your browser.

data.name: EnableNotifications
data.value: Would you like to enable notifications?
